title: FS: 1939 Babe Ruth at BBHOF Opening Day RPPC
author: jb217676

posts.post_title: FS: 1939 Babe Ruth at BBHOF Opening Day RPPC
posts.post_content:
Hi everyone,
Available for sale is a cool 1939 RPPC of opening day at the baseball hall of fame. That figure you see in the distance above everyone in the crowd is none other than Babe Ruth at the podium. Never seen another! Price is "SOLD" plus shipping. PM or post if interested and thanks for looking!
Jeff
